name: EmojiOhm
description:
EmojiOhm is a small interactive experience created as part of Girl Geek Academy's Gender Equality Game Jam.

 In EmojiOwm you explore a space and interact with different social situations. Depending on how you react to these experiences you will improve your soft skills and grow your knowledge about dealing with difficult social situations and having a positive impact on your environment. 

Developer: Judy Mao

Art Direction: Luis Penuela

Production: Ruby  Quail
